raw_body: Eng. EDWARD WALTER KARUNARATNA – Former Addl. General Manager, CEB. Beloved husband of late Ranjini Karunaratna (nee Palliyaguru), father of Dr. Yuvani Weerasinghe & Eng. Piyumani Karunaratna (U.S.A.), father-in-law of Kanishka Weerasinghe and Anuradha Jayawardena (U.S.A.), passed away peacefully on 22.12.2023. Remains lie at A.F. Raymonds Funeral Parlour on 26th & 27th December. Cortege leaves at 3.30 p.m. on Wednesday 27th December for Cremation at the General Cemetery, Borella (Old Crematorium). 000001
